ack.p: The authors thank directors of the following herbaria: FRU, UBU. Dr. G.A. Lazkov (National Academy of Sciences, Kyrgyzstan; FRU) and Dr. Prof. B. Oyuntsetseg (National University of Mongolia, Mongolia; UBU) for permitting the examination of specimens, as well as Dr. Prof. H.J. Choi (Changwon National University, South Korea), for constructive comments.
